issue.title: [CF 1409] TMW causes an assertion failure on PTR
issue.body:
This only occurs when TMW is enabled on the PTR.  Tested with only TMW enabled, with a fresh WTF.  A similar issue was occurring to Weakauras during the 7.2 PTR cycle, may be related.  Assertion failure message occurs on login / reload:

 


> Posted by CurseForge user Kaedys | Imported from CurseForge issue #1409 | Raw

comments.body:
Yeah, this happens from time to time with PTR and Beta builds. They'll fix it soon. Certain spells, when you try and call GetSpellInfo on them, will cause this. Issues with WoW's code, or its data, or something.

Edited May 18, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Ahhh, interesting.  Well, explains my further findings, where around 8 of my common addons were triggering this issue under various circumstances.  Bleh, makes it super hard to test out class changes when I can't enable any of my addons >.<

 

Thanks for the response/explanation.

Edited May 18, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Kaedys
